attributes.action: The new GCSE specification should not be more difficult for newer generations.
attributes.background: A lot of pressure has been enforced onto students to get the best grades, however it is getting more harder. Resulting to physiological stress affecting our mental health. This is a huge disadvantage as it is harder to get our ideal jobs which affects ourselves and the future economy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "the new GCSE specification should not be more difficult for newer generations".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
